body:
Comment 1: 
Thank you for your detailed report.

it will certainly help if you can attach a tarball of work files for misc/cgo/test.
issue this command:
$ go test -work -x $GOROOT/misc/cgo/test

the command will display at first line WORK=/var/tmp/xxxxx
please make a tarball of all files under $WORK directory so that
I can test and fix this without upgrading to -current.
(of course, make sure the build fails with the same reason)
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @minux._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
